# faithful dataset
## EDA
```{r}
df_status(faithful)
summary(faithful)

faithful <- faithful
```
## Correlation - geom_point()

```{r}
# global definition
ggplot(faithful, aes (x = eruptions, y = waiting)) +
  geom_point()

# or layer definition
ggplot() +
  geom_point(aes (x = eruptions, y = waiting), faithful)
```

```{r}
ggplot(faithful) +
  geom_point(aes (x = eruptions, y = waiting, color = eruptions < 3))
```

```{r}
ggplot(faithful) +
  geom_point(aes (x = eruptions, y = waiting), color = "steelblue")
```

## Distribution - geom_hist()

```{r}
ggplot(faithful) +
  geom_histogram(aes(eruptions))

ggplot(faithful) +
  geom_histogram(aes(waiting))
```
